org.zaproxy.zap.utils
Enum ZapTextComponentUndoManager.UndoManagerPolicy

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<ZapTextComponentUndoManager.UndoManagerPolicy>
      org.zaproxy.zap.utils.ZapTextComponentUndoManager.UndoManagerPolicy
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ZapTextComponentUndoManager.UndoManagerPolicy>
Enclosing class:
ZapTextComponentUndoManager
public static enum ZapTextComponentUndoManager.UndoManagerPolicy
extends java.lang.Enum<ZapTextComponentUndoManager.UndoManagerPolicy>

There are three policies that affect if, and when, the undoable edits are saved:

  • UndoManagerPolicy.DEFAULT
  • UndoManagerPolicy.ALWAYS_ENABLED
  • UndoManagerPolicy.ALWAYS_DISABLED

See Also:
DEFAULT, ALWAYS_ENABLED, ALWAYS_DISABLED

Enum Constant Summary
ALWAYS_DISABLED
          The undoable edits are not saved.
ALWAYS_ENABLED
          The undoable edits are always saved, even if the JTextComponent is not editable and/or enabled.
DEFAULT
          The undoable edits are saved exactly when the JTextComponent is enabled and editable.

Enum Constant Detail

DEFAULT

public static final ZapTextComponentUndoManager.UndoManagerPolicy DEFAULT
The undoable edits are saved exactly when the JTextComponent is enabled and editable.

The ZapTextComponentUndoManager listens to the changes in the properties "enabled" and "editable", so that can change accordingly to save or not the undoable edits.

ALWAYS_ENABLED

public static final ZapTextComponentUndoManager.UndoManagerPolicy ALWAYS_ENABLED
The undoable edits are always saved, even if the JTextComponent is not editable and/or enabled.

ALWAYS_DISABLED

public static final ZapTextComponentUndoManager.UndoManagerPolicy ALWAYS_DISABLED
The undoable edits are not saved.
